verses.name: Esther 3:9
verses.text: If it please the king, let it be written that they may be destroyed: and I will pay ten thousand talents of silver to the hands of those that have the charge of the business, to bring it into the king’s treasuries.

verses.name: Esther 3:10
verses.text: And the king took his ring from his hand, and gave it unto Haman the son of Hammedatha the Agagite, the Jews’ enemy.

verses.name: Esther 3:11
verses.text: And the king said unto Haman, The silver is given to thee, the people also, to do with them as it seemeth good to thee.
